column2: Zero-emission ocean-going vessels will become market ready
column5: The development of zero-emission ocean-going vessels is likely to have a positive impact on reducing greenhouse gas emissions, which is a key aspect of the EU Climate ambition, as outlined in target TA1.9. This is because zero-emission vessels will contribute to decreasing emissions from the transportation sector, thereby supporting the EU's goal of achieving climate neutrality.

column2: Zero-emission large aircraft will become market ready
column5: The introduction of zero-emission large aircraft will have a positive effect on reducing greenhouse gas emissions, as stated in target TA1.9, by decreasing emissions from air transportation, thus aiding the EU in its pursuit of climate neutrality.

column2: Euro 7 pollutant limits
column5: Implementing Euro 7 pollutant limits, as mentioned in target TA4.47, will lead to a reduction in emissions from vehicles, which in turn will have a positive impact on achieving the EU Climate ambition, as outlined in target TA1.9, by decreasing overall greenhouse gas emissions.

column2: Climate Neutrality
column5: Achieving climate neutrality, as stated in target TA1.1, will require the development and implementation of zero-emission technologies, such as those mentioned in target TA4.45, to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from transportation.

column2: 2040 target under discussion
column5: Discussing a 2040 target, as mentioned in target TA1.2, will involve setting specific emission reduction goals, which may include the development of zero-emission ocean-going vessels, as stated in target TA4.45, to achieve climate neutrality.
